title: Fats Waller Was Born Here
description: The story of American jazz pianist Thomas “Fats” Waller and the little town of Passaic, New Jersey.
quote: Fats was the star that made the whole town shine.
altHero: Fats Waller, a black musician wearing a bow tie and smoking a cigarette
alt1: Mike and Jerry interview Elroy Fletcher outside his video store
alt2: Fats playing an organ with many pipes
alt4: Fats playing organ in an exaggerated scene with many people blowing pipes
